msbt.message: Most people perk up this time of year, but all these dang blossoms fill my sinuses fit to burstin'.
Lemme tell you somethin', kiddo. This season's no joke when you sweat as much as THIS ol' cuss! 'Course when I've got myself in my hand, then it ain't so bad, I guess On second thought, this is fine.
The thing I like about now is that it ain't winter and it ain't summer! Gahaha!

When I was little, my folks used to make us go outside and play, even when it was freezin' out there! Now that I'm grown, I don't go out in the cold unless I want to. 'Cause I'm in control now! 'Course, I won't turn my thermostat up even one degree, so I'm always cold inside, anyway. But still!

Tell me, do you kiddos still have a song of the summer these days?You knowthat one song that everyone's listenin' to all summer that just gets stuck in your head? Like that one that went, uh, lessee ♪ Summer, summer It's so great ♪ Or, you know, somethin' like that.
This time of year I get to thinkin' about the past. Nostalgia, y'know?Wait, does a kiddo like you even get sentimental for times gone by?
Sure I do.
Not really, no.
When it's cold like this, I just wanna fill my belly with somethin' warm
There's a nice, warm breeze and the air feels great outdoors. Not a bad day for walkin' at all!
Spring's all about startin' over So here's to a fresh, new start!I'm not gonna go startin' new stuff at my age, but good luck if you do.
All this nice weather's really bringin' out the bugs. At least the butterflies are pretty to look at,
This is the time of year where I put on extra paddin' so I can stay warm in the cold-weather months ahead.
When I hear them fall bugs singin', I start gettin' all sentimental-like.
This is the time of year to get in all your foliage viewin' while the viewin's good, !

This is the very best time of year for sleepin'. Know why?<10_4 /> 'Cause you can leave your windows open at night! I love me some fresh air, but try doin' that in the winter, and tell me how it goes! !
Yarrr<10_10 />CHOO!<10_9 />Urghallergies are drivin' me nuts! Why's this time of year so bad? Ain't there always pollen in the air? Not that I'm askin' for MORE allergies Gnaah<10_10 />CHOOO!<10_9 />
Oh yeah? Guess that must be why we get along so well, .
Maybe that's good Means you're still livin' through your good days!
Nothin' like a big ol' bowl of stew so hot you gotta blow on it before you can taste your first spoonful.But if you're like me, you rush it and burn your mouth, !

Nothin' like a fresh pizza pie, pipin' hot and right outta the ovenCheese still bubblin' and stringy, that orange grease drippin' off itBut when you try to sprinkle a few red pepper flakes on, the consarn lid pops off and they all dump out!

Nothin' like a steamin' hot bowl of clam chowder eaten on the beach.Picture this, kiddo Wind's kicked up, blowin' salt spray across the sand. Gettin' too chilly to swim. So you tuck yourself into a cozy booth with a view. And the server ladles you up a fresh bowl You crumble a few salty crackers over the top, take a sip, and Burn your dang tongue! Gahaha!

Do the little kiddos still get sent away to camp this time of year?Our folks used to look so happy, seein' us off on the bus to campBut we came back home all itchy and stinky from not showerin' for days.
Listen up! In hot weather, you gotta make sure to drink plenty of fluids.
On humid nights like this, I start cravin' ice-cold treats, and thinkin' back to scary drive-in movies
Takes real g-g-gumption to drag my achin' carcass outta bed on a c-c-cold mornin' like this

You got two options for warmin' up in this weather: from the outside in, or from the inside out. Reckon you can bundle up to try to keep the cold out, or put somethin' warm into you like a pipin' hot stew.
They say people with cold hands have warm hearts, but my hands're cold 'cause of my poor circulation.
